channel.title: Death
channel.description: Hey. I'm coding my own server atm and i've almost coded both Castle Wars and Duel Arena. I've got one problem with both, when you die .. you loose all your items and go back to home. How do i make it so when you die in cwars you get teleported back to your home base and dont loose any items and for duel arena, you tele back home but only loose your staked items? thanks

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

ok, i didnt get any errors but it still didnt work
this is where i put it

[code]if (CWA < 0)
{
CWA = 0;
}
if (CWT > 0)
{
CWT-=1;
if(CWT == 0)
{
CWon = false;

sendMessage(“A Castle Wars match ended! Go play, guys!”);
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3089;
heightLevel = 0;
remove(0,1);
deleteItem(4041, getItemSlot(4041), 1);
if(saraScore > zammyScore)
{
Winner = “Saradomin”;
sendMessage(“The game is over! “+Winner+” won the match! Go “+Winner+”!”);
}
else if(zammyScore > saraScore)
{
Winner = “Zamorak”;
sendMessage(“The game is over! “+Winner+” won the match! Go “+Winner+”!”);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“The game ended in an epic tie!”);
}
}
}
if (absX >=2386 && absX <=2390 && absY >=3130 && absY <=3135)
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
DeadStats();
youdied();
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 3130;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Fizzbitch: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
}[/code]

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

ok and would this be an ok death boolean?
if so what wud i need to change it to?

public boolean ApplyRingOfLife() { if (IsDeadTimer == false) { actionAmount++; actionTimer = 4; ResetAttack(); setAnimation(0x718); sendMessage("Your Ring of Life saved your life !"); deleteequiment(2570, playerRing); //2570 = ring of life IsDeadTimer = true; } if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) { teleportToX = 2906; teleportToY = 9685; IsDeadTeleporting = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } return true;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 01:21:43 AM[/size][hr]or is this a better one?
idk if not, can you find me 1?

[code] if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
DeadStats();
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
teleportToX = 2906;
teleportToY = 9685;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Fizzbitch: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();
                    
	}
	return true;
}[/code]
